name: Cox n Crendor: The Game
description:
Updated: 06/27/2019

I love Cox n Crendor in the Morning Podcast!  I did this as a learning project. I still have things to work out, and more levels; so this is def not done!

The art is a mix pf free assets and ripped images I made into sprites. I'm hoping to reach out to Jesse, Dan, or Crendor to see if I can get some assets from the animated vids.

Hope you enjoy it!
